99 Bottles of Beer
Outputs the lyrics of 99 Bottles of Beer. See full version at http://www.99-bottles-of-beer.net/lyrics.html.

!Explanation
004f - Assign without output
 0039 0039 - int of value 99
 00a6 - Separates int literals
 0030 - int of value 0
004c - do...
0017 - Outputs with newline
 002d - Subtract
  002b - Add
   002b - Add
    001a - Substitute value of
     0030 - int of value 0
